name: The Impossible Mission (XCVG)
description:
You are Sid, an elite Agent currently tasked to track down a former Navy officer that may be on possession of valuable secrets. She's been tracked down to the Chanticleer Hegemony, where she will briefly come out of hiding to see a once-in-a-lifetime concert. That is, if the show goes on...

The Impossible Mission is split and re-released from the RPG segment of RiftBreak. While it's described as an RPG and does have battles, it's more of an adventure that involves running around and talking to various NPCs. This was originally created for So Bad It's Good Jam 2020, so expect lots of jank and some outdated jokes. That being said, it stands well on its own as a subversion of a "basic RPG Maker game". This re-released version is largely the same as the original, with changes limited to much-needed quality-of-life improvements and a few minor fixes.
